#define SUME SPLT ID OFFSET 0x0
#define SUME SPLT ID DEFAULT 0x0000DA02
#define SUME SPLT ID WIDTH 32
#define SUME SPLT VERSION OFFSET 0x4
#define SUME SPLT VERSION DEFAULT 0x1
#define SUME SPLT VERSION WIDTH 32
#define SUME SPLT RESET OFFSET 0x8
#define SUME SPLT RESET DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME SPLT RESET WIDTH 16
#define SUME SPLT FLIP OFFSET 0xC
#define SUME SPLT FLIP DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME SPLT FLIP WIDTH 32
#define SUME SPLT DEBUG OFFSET 0x10
#define SUME SPLT DEBUG DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME SPLT DEBUG WIDTH 32
#define SUME SPLT PKTIN OFFSET 0x14
#define SUME SPLT PKTIN DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME SPLT PKTIN WIDTH 32
#define SUME SPLT PKTOUT OFFSET 0x18
#define SUME SPLT PKTOUT DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME SPLT PKTOUT WIDTH 32
